title: Add a New Spare Part to the System
description: A new type of sensor will be used on several machines. It needs to be added to the spare parts inventory system.

tasks.description: Create a new part number record in the inventory system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new item master record.

tasks.description: Enter details for the part, such as description, primary supplier, cost, and reorder point.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent populates all required fields for the new part.

tasks.description: Save the new part record and confirm it is now searchable in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent saves the record and successfully finds it using the search function.
